# parentGroup

**Instance Property**

Optional. Specifies the group to which to add the new contact on save.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var parentGroup: ABRecord? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You must set [doc://com.apple.addressbookui/documentation/AddressBookUI/ABNewPersonViewController/addressBook] before you can set this property.

## Configuring New Person Views

- **addressBook**: Optional. The address book to which the new contact is added.
